tag_list: small-business-owners, entrepreneur, start-up, makeovermachine-com, makeover-machine, super-webomatic, affordable-website-creation, small-business-websites
overview:
Chris is a serial entrepreneur and business innovator, who is high energy and highly motivated. He started out small and his entrepreneurial endeavors have grown over time; one of his most notable achievements was founding the networking company, Thrive Networks, which he eventually sold to Staples. He’s also been involved in many other entrepreneurial ventures.

He is currently the founder and CEO of superwebomatic.com, a service that provides affordable, comprehensive, attractive websites to small business owners. He recently launched the free web app tool http://www.makeovermachine.com that delivers free homepage mock ups to small businesses who submit their website for a makeover. Webomatic is the first company to ever use crowdsourcing software to create and sell websites; this approach is what allows them to sell their high quality product for a very reasonable price.

web_presences.title: Websites for small businesses | Super Webomatic
